attributes.action: Make horse riders pay road tax to be aloud to ride on the road.
attributes.additional_details: I feel it is unfair that horse riders are constantly making drivers slow down to pass their horses whilst there are vast fields and woods to ride in. To use the road they should have to pay like everyone else.
attributes.background: Horses use the road as well as cars, yet don’t have to pay and road tax. To contribute to a nation of smooth roads horse riders should have to pay just like motorists.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There is no speciifc road tax, though drivers are required to pay Vehicle Excise Duty based on CO2 emissions.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
